text: Tara balabe, â€˜pabitra o mahana apani! Apanara paribarte amara an'yake abibhabakarupe grahana karate pari na [1]; apani'i to taderake ebam tadera pitrpurusaderake bhoga-sambhara diyechilena; pariname tara yikara tatha smarana bhule giyechila ebam parinata hayechila eka dhbansaprapta sampradaye
